intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite youth activity?
What do you want to do when you finish school?

respond_situations.starter_line: What would you like to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. Choose a drink.
You see a shirt. Ask about the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to play outside?
respond_situations.description: You are talking to a friend.

respond_situations.starter_line: Do you want to watch a movie?

ask_situations.instruction: You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of an item.
You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to ask a stranger for the time. ..

listening_script.text: I visit my friend. We play games together. We eat snacks. We watch a movie. I go home at 6 PM.

monologue.topic: Talk about things you do alone

follow_up_questions.question: What do you like to do alone?
When do you spend time alone?
Where do you go when you are alone?
How do you feel when you are alone?
